results.title: Veteran Filmmaker Gangu Ramsay Of Ramsay Brothers Passes Away At 83 In Mumbai
results.content: Gangu Ramsay, the celebrated cinematographer, filmmaker, and producer known for his work with The Ramsay Brothers, passed away at the age of 83 at Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital in Mumbai. Gangu Ramsay had been battling health issues for the past month before peacefully departing early on April 7, 2024, at 8 a.m. During his illustrious career, Gangu Ramsay made significant creative contributions to over 50 iconic films produced under the Ramsay Brothers banner. His portfolio includes cult classics such as 'Veerana,' 'Purana Mandir,' 'Bandh Darwaza,' 'Do Gaz Zameen Ke Niche,' 'Samri,' 'Tehkhana,' 'Purani Haveli,' and 'Khoj' starring Rishi Kapoor. Notably, Gangu Ramsay played a pivotal role in shaping Saif Ali Khan's debut film, 'Ashiq Awara,' capturing the essence of the actor's early career. He also collaborated with Akshay Kumar, leaving an indelible mark on the Khiladi series with films like 'Khiladiyon Ka Khiladi,' 'Sabse Bada Khiladi,' 'Mr. and Mrs. Khiladi,' 'Pandav,' and 'Mr. Bond.' Beyond his contributions to Bollywood, Gangu Ramsay ventured into television and became a household name with his popular show 'Zee Horror Show,' which captivated audiences for over eight years. His impact extended to other notable series on Zee TV, including 'Saturday Suspense,' 'Naagin,' and 'Zimbo.' Gangu Ramsay was part of a talented family of filmmakers, with seven brothers collectively producing more than 30 horror films in India during the 1970s and 1980s. The Ramsay Brothers, including Kumar, Gangu, Tulsi, Arjun, Shyam, Keshu, and Kiran Ramsay, left an enduring legacy in Indian cinema and television. The passing of Gangu Ramsay marks the end of an era, leaving behind a rich tapestry of cinematic achievements that continue to inspire and entertain audiences across generations. This comprehensive tribute honors Gangu Ramsay's remarkable contributions to Indian entertainment and his enduring influence on the horror genre.

results.title: #WorldHealthDay - When Tamannah Bhatia said: “Working out is as essential as brushing one's teeth”
results.description: Tamannaah Bhatia, the epitome of fitness, shares her secrets for a healthy lifestyle. From prioritizing workouts to embracing homemade meals, she advocates for balance and moderation. With a diverse fitness regime and nutritious diet, she sets an example of holistic wellness, inspiring others to prioritize health and well-being in the new year.
results.content: Tamannaah Bhatia, known as the epitome of fitness, recently shared her secrets for maintaining a healthy lifestyle on the occasion of World Health Day. From prioritizing workouts to embracing homemade meals, Tamannaah advocates for balance and moderation in all aspects of wellness. She sets an inspiring example of holistic wellness, emphasizing the importance of fitness as essential as brushing one's teeth. Tamannaah's commitment to fitness extends beyond mere routines; it's a way of life that she passionately advocates. In an interview with ETimes, she highlighted the essential role of exercise in her daily routine, equating it with brushing teeth for maintaining positivity and energy levels. In addition to regular workouts, Tamannaah emphasizes the significance of a balanced diet, rejecting crash diets and opting for wholesome, nutrient-rich meals. Her dietary choices include muesli bowls, protein-packed breakfasts, dal, brown rice, vegetables, and healthy snacks like nuts, yogurt, and juices. Despite her busy schedule, Tamannaah prioritizes her health by incorporating simple yet effective habits into her daily life. From starting her day with soaked almonds to maintaining energy levels with replenishing snacks during shoots, she remains dedicated to staying active and nourished. Tamannaah's fitness regime reflects diversity, incorporating weight training, cardio, yoga, and freehand exercises. Whether at the gym or engaging in morning yoga and swimming sessions, she remains committed to a well-rounded approach to fitness and overall well-being. This comprehensive summary encapsulates Tamannaah Bhatia's holistic approach to health and fitness, emphasizing the importance of regular exercise, balanced nutrition, and mindful habits for overall wellness.
